SEARCH
Package com.dhk.ui

Class DhkView

java.lang.Object
com.dhk.ui.DhkView
public class DhkView extends Object
This class defines the view for Display Hot Keys. The layout for the view components is defined here. View components are initialized and arranged in a GridBag layout.
Version:
1.2.0
Author:
Jonathan Miller
License:
The MIT License
Copyright:
Jonathan Miller 2024

  • Constructor Details

    • DhkView

      public DhkView(DhkModel model, boolean darkMode, boolean runOnStartup)
      Constructor for the DhkView class.
      Parameters:
      model - - The model for the application.
      darkMode - - Whether or not to start the view in dark mode.
      runOnStartup - - Whether or not to run the application when the user logs into Windows.

  • Method Details

    • initComponents

      public void initComponents()
      This method initializes the components and the initial selection for each interactive component.

    • addSlots

      public void addSlots(int startIndex)
      This method adds slots to the view panel until the new number of slots is reached.
      Parameters:
      startIndex - - The index in which to start adding slots to the view's slot array.

    • removeSlots

      public void removeSlots(int numOfSlotsToRemove)
      This method removes the specified number of slots to remove from the view panel.
      Parameters:
      numOfSlotsToRemove - - The number of slots to remove from the view panel.
